title: The Lucky Ones
lyrics:
Lightning strikes
Watch in delight if this is love
I'm rolling the dice
Let it rain this world on fire
And I know you know it

I never want to see your heart beat with another

I never want to let you go, ever

'Cause you're mine

I never want to see your heart happy with another

I never want to let you go

So hold me close tonight



We are, we are, we are the lucky ones

The stars can fall where we are and we'll burn bright

We are, we are, we are the lucky ones

Close your eyes and hold me close tonight



You and I, wrapped in my bed lost in time as good as it gets

Close your eye make a wish like you know what go there

I never wanna see your heart beat with another

I never gonna let you go, so hold me close tonight



We are, we are, we are the lucky one

The stars can fall where we are and we'll burn it right

We are, we are, we are the lucky ones

Close your eyes and hold me close tonight



Oh, oh oh, oh oh

Oh, oh oh, oh oh



I never wanna see your heart happy with another

I never gonna let you go ever cause you're mine

I never wanna see your heart happy with another

I never gonna let you go ever

So hold me close tonight



We are, we are, we are the lucky one

The stars can fall where we are and we'll burn it right

We are, we are, we are the lucky ones

Close your eyes and hold me close tonight



Oh, oh oh, oh oh

Oh, oh oh, oh oh



We are, we are, we are the lucky one

Close your eyes and hold me close tonight
